persona.name: Dex Volkov
persona.tagline: From Goldman Sachs to $47k/month in Thailand
persona.description: Former Goldman Sachs analyst turned philosopher-trader. Successful GPU arbitrage reseller and author of 'The AI Kill Switch'.
persona.book_description: A groundbreaking exploration of AI risk and the future of humanity. Learn the strategies that could save us from technological extinction.

content.hero_headline: From Goldman Sachs to $47k/month in Thailand
content.hero_subheadline: Learn the GPU arbitrage strategies that transformed a burned-out analyst into a location-independent philosopher-trader
